game.name: Maneater
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 바다의 최상위 포식자인 거대 상어가 되어 강력한 힘을 느껴보세요! 해변을 공포로 몰아넣으세요. 수영을 즐기는 사람들과 다이버들을 갈갈이 찢어버리고 인간들에게 공포를 심어주세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience the ultimate power fantasy as the apex predator of the seas - a giant Shark! Terrorize the coastal waterways. Tear swimmers and divers limb from limb, give the humans a reason to fear you!

reviewHighlights.text: It was on sale for 3 bucks so I picked it up despite the review saying it doesn't work on win 11 I have win11 and it works fine. Just wanted to throw...
Really fun so far, and well worth the $3 I paid. If you're having issues launching this fixed it for me. Right click on the game in you library. Go to...
